name: tenpenny
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
costing or worth ten pennies: On his keychain he kept a tenpenny knife that he had won as a prize at a carnival. She felt in her pocket for a tenpenny piece and dropped it in the collection box.
More examplesFewer examplesShe extracted a tenpenny coin from her purse and handed it to the shopkeeper. She gave him the usual shiny new tenpenny piece. I remember when you could still send a letter with a tenpenny stamp. He kept dropping the tenpenny bits through his fingers in his pockets.
